msg: DERBY-3421: Remove unused code for caching of connect bytes.

author: cziegeler
msg: Use thread pooling for scheduler as well. Create own pool for eventing.

author: andreas
msg: Removing monitoring module configuration (didn't commit the module).

author: vborja
msg: - ArchiveTask::Path#excluded? uses File::FNM_PATHNAME so that patterns like
match "some/Foo.class" but not "some/bar/Bar.class". "some/**/*.class" will match both of them.
- Fixed other calls to File.fnmatch to use FNM_PATHNAME when it makes sense.
- Created simple Merge class so that when ArchiveTask#merge takes several archives, users may
package(..).merge('some.zip', 'other.zip').include("**/*.jpg) # Just include images from both zips
